sentence: Unilever NV ( UN ) will begin trading ex-dividend on October 28, 2015.
A cash dividend payment of $0.3435 per share is scheduled to be paid on December 09, 2015.
Shareholders who purchased UN prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 4.66% increase over the prior quarter.
At the current stock price of $45.57, the dividend yield is 3.02%.
The previous trading day's last sale of UN was $45.57, representing a -2.06% decrease from the 52 week high of $46.53 and a 22.37% increase over the 52 week low of $37.24.
UN is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
Zacks Investment Research reports UN's forecasted earnings growth in 2015 as 10.48%, compared to an industry average of 6.8%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the UN Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
